Description: Sets the user to connect to the server as. This user must exist on the server and, if applicable, have the appropriate permissions to access the specified database. The default is 'amp'
Sets the database to connect to, if applicable. This database must exist on the server

Specifies [additional command line options](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/mariadbd-options/) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care. Alternatively, specify the equivalent under "Options File Settings"

Specifies [options file settings](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/configuring-mariadb-with-option-files/) to include in '.my.cnf' that are not otherwise set by AMP. One setting per line, including the option group heading
